story.text: What is harder is to build a set of appropriate incentives and apply these to the actions of the various parties in the process.

More thought still needs to be put into the soft cultures that have evolved over recent history, and to ensure that the process of evolution of these structures is responsive to the purpose of the endeavour - namely "[[knowledge creation]] for the [[common good]]".
- that is the question of governance over time is fit for purpose
